## Description {#details}

IR Values for the lower and upper bounds of a pointer evolution.

We need to use value-handles because <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expansion can invalidate previously expanded values. Thus expansion of a pointer can invalidate the bounds for a previous one.

Definition at line 1858 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/looputils-cpp">LoopUtils.cpp</a>.
